short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is the chrome extension version of immedia.xyz, a data aggregator of current events on any given topic

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Immedia-Extension is a data aggregator that overlays unto the high-level context provided by Wikipedia. The interactive timeline contains data collected over the past last 30 days from sources like the New York Times, Youtube, and Twitter about any given subject.

Hover over a media bubble to get an embedded preview of the content. A simple click on a bubble or preview will link you directly to the original content.

That’s pretty much it.  A clean, simple aggregation of a subject’s background information and any recent events.
